branchCategory.name: Metric, North American & European Specifications (AR*25/35 Pilot Operated Regulator)
branchCategory.description: <P>Cost effective and clean looking, series AR regulators offer various pressure range settings to accommodate most applications. The locking adjustment knob prevents accidental setting changes. The modular design of the AR series connects with other SMC air preparation equipment. <FONT color=#ff0000>The current AR series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only. For size 10 models, please utilize the AR-A series. For sizes 50~60, please utilize the AR-B series. For sizes 20~40 please utilize the AR-A or AR-B series as appropriate to your performance and option needs.</FONT></P>
